member_organisations:
This is a link to our Members: 
http://www.eurocham-cambodia.org/members-directory
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: #30 Preah Norodom Boulevard 3rd Floor BRED Bank Building
industry_forums: We are interested in how the European business interests around the World and in particular in Southeast Asia and Cambodia are discussed in Industry Forums.
inter_groups: We are interested in how the European business interests around the World and in particular in Southeast Asia and Cambodia are perceived, promoted and protected by the European Parliament.
eu_initiatives:
- Every activity related to the promotion of trade and investment with Cambodia 
- EBA agreement and its possible evolutions 
- Related activities undertaken by DG Trade
organisation_name: European Chamber of Commerce in Cambodia (EuroCham Cambodia)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- Member of the European Business Organizations World Wide Network (EBOWWN) - https://www.ebowwn.com/ 
 
- Member of the EU ASEAN SME Support Network (European Chambers of Commerce in Southeast Asia) http://eubusinessinasean.eu/ 
 
-Member of the Cambodia Federation of Business Associations (CAMFEBA) http://www.camfeba.com/
